title: Buffett acquires $4.9 Billion Stake in Google parent Alphabet
description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway acquires a $4.9 billion stake in Alphabet while trimming its Apple and Bank of America holdings.
author: Bloomberg
content: Warren Buffetts Berkshire Hathaway Inc. acquired 17.9 million shares of Google parent Alphabet Inc. during the third quarter, while further trimming its holdings in Bank of America Corp. and Apple In… [+1173 chars]

title: Robinhood Offers to Bring Cash to Your Doorstep, for a Fee
description: The brokerage is teaming with mobile app Gopuff to provide banking customers home delivery of cash from their accounts.
author: Hannah Erin Lang
content:
Cash delivery is the latest sign that Robinhood isnt afraid to push the envelope on nontraditional financial services. - Mark Lennihan/AP
